longBusinessSummary.0: Affle (India) Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides mobile advertisement services through information technology and software development services for mobiles in India and internationally. It operates through Consumer Platform and Enterprise Platform segments. The company provides reselling services of advertisement space for online publishing companies; and customized mobile app development services. It also offers Appnext, an app recommendation platform; mDMP, a data organize platform; Mediasmart, a self serve programmatic platform; Jampp, a programmatic app platform; MAAS platform, an unified audience platform for mobile; RevX, an app marketers platform; and Vizury, a digital and physical customer engagement platform. Affle (India) Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Gurugram, India.
